name: Elemental Girl
description:
Controls

  • Movement = W,A,S,D
  • Dash = Space

After clearing each stage, you get to choose an additional element. Choose right combinations of elements to unlock skills to defeat your enemies.

Created by Team Hideout

  • excalet007
  • giraffeStar
  • RhyBad
  • sizrit

fonts : Thaleah by Tiny Worlds, m5x7 by Daniel Linssen

art : 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72
